channel.title: Asteroid comet of the Day
channel.description: RSS feed of the asteroid comet of the day.

item.title: Comet Cursor
item.description: Comet Cursor was a software program written by Comet Systems. It allowed users of the Microsoft Windows operating system to change the appearance of their mouse cursor and to allow websites to use customized cursors for visitors. The product installed itself without user permission and is an early example of spyware.
